duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage large-scale construction and redevelopment projects, including transportation facilities, corporate office buildings, and operations command centers.
Align and integrate Technology Design and Deployment lifecycle with the Architectural and Engineering Construction lifecycles.
Manage Engineering design and deployment of technology infrastructure for building renovations, restacks, relocations, cabling, network, and systems.
Manage Engineering design, deployment, and integration of multiple technologies such as Audio/Visual systems, Content Management Systems, Video Surveillance Systems, and Access Control Systems.
Maintain budgets and update project deliverables accurately.
